message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. We are confident this is an attractive offer considering the product's worth to you is $12,000. Let's discuss how we can make this partnership mutually beneficial.

Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the value you're presenting, $14,000 is slightly outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for the product. This price is still within your profit margin and reflects the value I see in it. Let's work together to make this deal happen.
